edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.pam
Class PamNodeStructure

java.lang.Object
  edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.shared.NodeStructureImpl
      edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.pam.PamNodeStructure
All Implemented Interfaces:
NodeStructure, BroadcastContent, WorkspaceContent
public class PamNodeStructure
extends NodeStructureImpl

A node structure that supports activation passing between linkables.

Author:
Ryan J McCall

getParentsAndConnectingLinks

public java.util.Map<PamNode,PamLink> getParentsAndConnectingLinks(Node n)
When you excite the parents of a node you might want to excite the connecting links too. Thus this method find the parents and all the links between supplied node and them

Parameters:
n -
Returns:
map of parents and links connecting node to them
